channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-1592] TestLruBlockCache failing on Hudson
item.description:
TestLruBlockCache is failing on Hudson:

http://hudson.zones.apache.org/hudson/job/HBase-Patch/684/testReport/org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile/TestLruBlockCache/testResizeBlockCache/

Error Message



expected:<0> but was:<1>



Stacktrace



junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: expected:<0> but was:<1>

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.TestLruBlockCache.testResizeBlockCache(TestLruBlockCache.java:435)



Standard Output



sleep

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
